fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.resource

Interface PersistentResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Iterable<PersistentEObject>, Notifier, Resource, Resource.Internal, Storable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPersistentResource, PersistentResourceDecorator

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface PersistentResource
extends Resource, Resource.Internal, Storable, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Iterable<PersistentEObject>
    A Resource that provides efficient model-level operations that are not accessible using the standard EMF API.

    For example, allInstancesOf(EClass) is a utility method that computes efficiently all the instances of a given type by delegating the operation to the underlying database, that can benefits of its internal optimizations and indices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource

      • allInstancesOf

        @Nonnull
default <T extends EObject> java.lang.Iterable<T> allInstancesOf(EClass eClass)
        Computes the set of instances of the given EClass (including its sub-types).

        This method behaves like: allInstancesOf(EClass, false).

        Parameters:
        eClass - the EClass for which look for instances
        Returns:
        all the instances of the given EClass from the resource
        See Also:
        allInstancesOf(EClass, boolean)

      • allInstancesOf

        @Nonnull
<T extends EObject> java.lang.Iterable<T> allInstancesOf(EClass eClass,
                                                                  boolean strict)
        Computes the set of instances of the given EClass.
        Parameters:
        eClass - the EClass for which look for instances
        strict - true if the lookup searches for strict instances
        Returns:
        if true then the method returns only the strict instances of the given EClass, otherwise it also returns the instances of the sub-types of eClass.
